definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Cracks have appeared on the dam's surface and workshops at the site have collapsed .
sentences.chinese: 紫坪铺水坝的表面出现了裂纹，周围的工场也已坍塌。

sentences.english: In the end, the mammoth dam had an oversized impact on world opinion.
sentences.chinese: 最终，巨型水坝对世界舆论产生了非常大的影响。

sentences.english: The dam builders claim they have completed an adequate design and safety analysis.
sentences.chinese: 水坝工程师声称，他们做了充分的设计和安全性分析。

sentences.english: Intermittent showers pushed up water levels to record highs in two dams in Leizhou yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 间歇性阵雨推高水位纪录高点在两个水坝雷州昨天。

sentences.english: As can be seen from the picture, the back ground is the Muda Dam.
sentences.chinese: 可以看出，从图片，回到地面是慕达水坝。

sentences.english: With so many dams, it is hard to know where the gravest danger lies.
sentences.chinese: 有这么多的危险水坝，很难说最最危险的是哪座。

sentences.english: A cataclysm caused by the dam breaking.
sentences.chinese: 一场因水坝破裂所造成的大洪水。

sentences.english: Thismakes it the largest dam in Asia - at the moment. It is also one ofthe oldest.
sentences.chinese: 它至今仍是亚洲最大的水坝，同时也是最古老的。

sentences.english: Imagining anenormous, expensive concrete dam, Hall started to hit Delete.
sentences.chinese: 想像到巨大而昂贵的混凝土水坝，霍尔开始点击删除。

sentences.english: Simply supported reinforced concrete bridges spanning the spillways all came off their bearings.
sentences.chinese: 由泄水坝支撑的横跨水泥公路完全脱离了它的承载体。

sentences.english: Temperature-controlled concrete is used to build large-sized dykes and high buildings.
sentences.chinese: 大型水坝和高层建筑工作需要采用温控混凝土。

sentences.english: No nation has ever built a dam so big.
sentences.chinese: 从没有国家建造过这么大的水坝。

sentences.english: Zipingpu is only one of nearly 400 hydroelectric dams in the earthquake zone.
sentences.chinese: 紫坪铺只有一个近400水坝的地震区。

sentences.english: Some dams will be in Peruvian and Bolivia parts of the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 部分水坝将在雨林位于秘鲁和玻利维亚的地区修建。

sentences.english: A body of water controlled by such a barrier .

definition: earth dam/dam of earth and rocks (as opposed to waterproof dam of clay or concrete)
to pilot a ship/to channel water/to draw water (for irrigation)
